title: View key analytics widgets on the Dashboard (calls, appointments, sentiment)
description: Verifies that after login the dashboard shows total calls today, appointments booked, and average sentiment widgets.

title: Dashboard shows recent activity feed and hot lead alerts
description: Verifies that the dashboard renders the recent activity feed and hot lead alerts section after login.

steps.description: Verify element "Activity feed list" is visible

title: Open a recent activity item to view call record details
description: Verifies that clicking an activity item opens a detailed record showing cost, appointment ID, and tools used.

steps.description: Click on the first item in the "Recent activity" list

title: Drilldown view shows cost value formatted as currency or cents label
description: Verifies that the detailed call record presents a visible cost value (for example with a currency symbol or a cents label).

steps.description: Click on the first item in the "Recent activity" list

title: Dashboard loads aggregated metrics without showing an error banner
description: Verifies that when dashboard stats load successfully, the page does not show a re-authentication error banner.

steps.description: Verify element "Dashboard stats section" is visible

title: Dashboard metrics display numeric values (not placeholders)
description: Verifies that key metrics render as visible numbers rather than empty states or loading placeholders.

steps.description: Verify element "Total calls value" is visible
Verify element "Appointments booked value" is visible
Verify element "Average sentiment value" is visible

title: Dashboard remains usable while recent activity loads
description: Verifies that the dashboard shows the main analytics widgets even if the activity feed is still loading.

steps.description: Verify element "Recent activity loading indicator" is visible

title: Search call logs by caller name or phone number and open call details
description: Verifies that searching call logs filters the list and a matching call can be opened to view details.

steps.description: Type a caller name or phone number from a visible call row into the search field
Verify text matching the search term is visible in the results list
Click the call row that matches the search results

title: Filter call logs by status and date range
description: Verifies that applying a status filter and a date-range filter updates the call list results.

steps.description: Select "Completed" from the status filter dropdown
Verify text "Completed" is visible in the active filters area
Fill a start date into the date range start field
Fill an end date into the date range end field
Verify the calls results list is visible

title: Send an SMS follow-up from call details
description: Verifies that an SMS follow-up can be composed and sent from a call detail view and a success message is shown.

steps.description: Click the first call row in the list to open details
Type "Thanks for calling—please reply with any questions or preferred appointment times." into the SMS message field

title: Delete a call record from the call logs list
description: Verifies that a call record can be deleted with confirmation and is removed from the list.

steps.description: Type a unique visible value from the first call row (caller name or number) into the search field
Verify the results list shows at least one matching call row

title: Malformed phone search shows validation/error and no results
description: Verifies that entering an invalid phone string in search shows an error/validation message and does not show matching results.

title: Clear search to return to the unfiltered call logs list
description: Verifies that clearing the search input returns the call logs view back to the full (or default) list.

steps.description: Type a caller name or phone number from a visible call row into the search field
Verify the calls results list is visible
Click the "Clear" (or "X") control in the search field
Verify the search field is empty
Verify the calls results list is visible

title: Open call details from a filtered-by-status list
description: Verifies that after filtering by status, a call can still be opened and its details are shown.

steps.description: Select "Missed" from the status filter dropdown
Verify text "Missed" is visible in the active filters area
Click the first call row in the filtered list

title: View appointments list with pagination and open an appointment to see linked call data
description: Verifies the user can browse the appointments list, paginate, open an appointment, and see linked call information in details.

title: Open appointment details and verify call Golden Record/link is visible
description: Verifies appointment details include visible linked call data (Golden Record) for traceability.

steps.description: Click the first appointment in the appointments list

title: Filter appointments by Pending status and verify results reflect the filter
description: Verifies filtering the appointments list by Pending updates the visible results.

title: Pending appointment reschedule to a valid new date and verify status/date updates
description: Verifies a pending appointment can be rescheduled with a valid new date and the updated information is visible afterward.

steps.description: Click the first appointment in the filtered list

title: Complete reschedule submit and verify confirmation is visible
description: Verifies the reschedule form can be submitted and a visible success/updated state appears.

steps.description: Click the first appointment in the appointments list

title: Cancel an appointment and confirm status becomes Cancelled
description: Verifies the user can cancel an appointment, confirm the action, and see the updated cancelled status in UI.

steps.description: Click the first appointment in the appointments list

title: Attempt to reschedule with an invalid date and verify validation error is shown
description: Verifies invalid reschedule input is blocked with a visible validation message and the appointment is not updated.

steps.description: Click the first appointment in the appointments list

title: Filter appointments by date range and verify results update
description: Verifies date range filtering updates the appointment list to reflect the chosen range.

title: Edit an existing agent and save changes (inbound tab)
description: Verifies a user can edit an inbound agent’s basic details and see a visible save confirmation.

steps.description: Click "Agent Config" in the dashboard navigation
Click the first agent in the agent list to open it for editing
Fill "E2E Inbound Agent" into the agent name field
Fill "Updated by UI E2E test" into the agent description field

title: Switch between inbound and outbound tabs and verify agent lists are visible
description: Verifies the user can switch tabs without errors and sees the correct tab content area update.

steps.description: Click "Agent Config" in the dashboard navigation

title: Assign a phone number to an agent and verify it appears on the agent card after save
description: Verifies a phone number can be assigned from a dropdown and is visibly reflected after saving.

steps.description: Click "Agent Config" in the dashboard navigation
Click the first agent in the agent list to open it for editing
Select the first available phone number option from the dropdown
Verify the phone number value is visible on the agent card or within the agent details panel

title: Set greeting and max call duration and save
description: Verifies greeting and maximum call duration fields can be updated and saved with a confirmation.

steps.description: Click "Agent Config" in the dashboard navigation
Click the first agent in the agent list to open it for editing
Fill "Hello, this is Voxanne AI. How can I help you today?" into the greeting / first message field
Fill "5" into the max call duration field

title: Trigger a test call from agent config and verify test call started confirmation
description: Verifies the Test action can be initiated and the UI shows a visible indication that a test call has started (without requiring external phone receipt verification).

steps.description: Click "Agent Config" in the dashboard navigation
Click the first agent in the agent list to open it for editing

title: Prevent saving when system prompt is overly long (validation error)
description: Verifies overly long system prompts show a visible validation error and block saving.

steps.description: Click "Agent Config" in the dashboard navigation
Click the first agent in the agent list to open it for editing

Fill "" into the system prompt field

title: Save button remains disabled or shows error when required fields are cleared
description: Verifies basic required-field validation by clearing the agent name and ensuring saving is blocked or an error appears.

steps.description: Click "Agent Config" in the dashboard navigation
Click the first agent in the agent list to open it for editing
Fill "" into the agent name field

title: Add a manual text knowledge base entry and see it in the list
description: Verifies a user can create a manual text entry with a title and content and it appears in the knowledge base list.

steps.description: Click on "Knowledge Base" in the dashboard navigation
Click the "Add manual text entry" button
Type "Test KB Entry" into the title field
Type "This is a test knowledge base entry content." into the content field
Verify text "Test KB Entry" is visible

title: Try to save a manual text entry with missing required fields
description: Verifies the manual entry form validates required fields and prevents saving when mandatory data is missing.

steps.description: Click on "Knowledge Base" in the dashboard navigation
Click the "Add manual text entry" button
Verify text "Title is required" is visible
Verify text "Content is required" is visible

title: View wallet balance, trend chart, and transaction history
description: Verifies the wallet page loads and shows GBP balance, a trend chart, and transaction history entries.

title: Open Top Up flow and verify Stripe Checkout page is reached
description: Verifies that starting a £25 top-up transitions the user to a Stripe checkout experience.

title: Top Up dialog can be opened and closed without changes
description: Verifies the Top Up UI can be dismissed cleanly and returns to the wallet view.

title: Validation prevents top-up below the minimum amount
description: Verifies that entering a top-up amount below £25 shows a validation message and prevents checkout.

steps.description: Fill "£5" into the top-up amount field

title: Set auto-recharge with valid threshold and save
description: Verifies auto-recharge can be enabled by entering a threshold and saving settings.

steps.description: Fill "25" into the auto-recharge threshold field
Select the first available payment method option from the payment method dropdown

title: Auto-recharge required fields validation
description: Verifies the auto-recharge form shows a visible error when attempting to save with missing required fields.

title: Transaction history shows expected column labels and at least one entry state
description: Verifies transaction history area is present and displays either entries or an explicit empty state.

title: Access Phone Settings page after login
description: Verifies an authenticated user can reach the Phone Settings page and see the managed numbers section.

steps.description: Click "Phone Settings" in the dashboard navigation

title: Buy a new managed phone number (happy path)
description: Verifies a user can start the buy flow, select a country/area, complete purchase, and see the new number appear in the list.

steps.description: Click "Phone Settings" in the dashboard navigation
Click the "Buy new phone number" button
Select "United States" from the country dropdown

title: Complete number purchase and confirm new number appears
description: Verifies completing the purchase shows a success state and the newly purchased number is visible in the managed numbers list.

steps.description: Click "Phone Settings" in the dashboard navigation
Click the "Buy new phone number" button
Select "United States" from the country dropdown

title: Configure AI forwarding mode to Total AI and save
description: Verifies selecting an existing managed number, setting forwarding to Total AI, configuring ring time, and saving reflects an active forwarding mode.

steps.description: Click "Phone Settings" in the dashboard navigation
Click the first managed phone number in the list
Select "total AI" from the AI forwarding mode dropdown

title: Verify forwarding ring time can be set and persists after save
description: Verifies the user can set a forwarding ring time, save, and still see the configured value displayed as active.

steps.description: Click "Phone Settings" in the dashboard navigation
Click the first managed phone number in the list
Select "30 seconds" from the ring time dropdown

title: Delete a managed number and confirm removal
description: Verifies deleting a managed number via confirmation removes it from the list.

steps.description: Click "Phone Settings" in the dashboard navigation
Click the first managed phone number in the list
Verify text "No managed numbers" is visible

title: Prevent buying a second managed number when one already exists
description: Verifies the UI shows an error and blocks purchase when the organization already has a managed number.

steps.description: Click "Phone Settings" in the dashboard navigation
Verify at least one managed phone number is visible
Click the "Buy new phone number" button
Verify text "Only one managed number" is visible

title: Block number purchase when wallet balance is insufficient
description: Verifies attempting a purchase with insufficient balance shows a billing error and does not add a new number.

steps.description: Click "Phone Settings" in the dashboard navigation
Click the "Buy new phone number" button
Select "United States" from the country dropdown

title: Text chat test: send a message and receive an agent reply
description: Verifies a user can send a text message to the test agent and see an agent reply in the chat window.

steps.description: Click on "Test" in the dashboard navigation
Type "Hello—please confirm you can help book an appointment." into the message input field
Verify text "Hello—please confirm you can help book an appointment." is visible in the chat window
Verify an element "Agent message" is visible in the chat window

title: Text chat test: pressing Enter sends the message
description: Verifies the text input supports sending a message via the Enter key and the message appears in the chat history.

steps.description: Click on "Test" in the dashboard navigation
Type "What are your office hours?" into the message input field
Verify text "What are your office hours?" is visible in the chat window
Verify an element "Agent message" is visible in the chat window

title: Text chat validation: prevent sending an empty message
description: Verifies the UI prevents sending a blank text message and shows a visible validation state.

steps.description: Click on "Test" in the dashboard navigation
Verify text "Message cannot be empty" is visible

title: Submit onboarding intake form with all required fields (no optional attachment)
description: Verifies a user can complete the onboarding intake form with required fields and sees a success confirmation.

steps.description: Type "Acme Health Clinic" into the Company Name field
Type "Thanks for calling Acme Health Clinic. How can I help you today?" into the Greeting Script field
Click on the Voice selection option "Default"

title: Submit onboarding intake form with a different voice selection
description: Verifies selecting a non-default voice option still allows successful submission and shows a success message.

steps.description: Type "Sunrise Dental" into the Company Name field
Type "Hello, you’ve reached Sunrise Dental. How may we assist you?" into the Greeting Script field
Click on the Voice selection option "Female"

title: Required field validation: greeting script omitted blocks submission
description: Verifies the form prevents submission and shows a validation message when greeting script is missing.

steps.description: Type "Maple Family Practice" into the Company Name field
Click on the Voice selection option "Default"

title: Phone format validation: invalid phone blocks submission
description: Verifies the form shows a phone format error when the phone number is not in E.164 format and submission is blocked.

steps.description: Type "Pine Pediatrics" into the Company Name field
Type "Hi! You’ve reached Pine Pediatrics. How can we help?" into the Greeting Script field
Click on the Voice selection option "Default"

title: Email format validation: invalid email blocks submission
description: Verifies the form shows an email validation error and does not submit when email format is invalid.

steps.description: Type "Cedar Orthopedics" into the Company Name field
Type "Thank you for calling Cedar Orthopedics. How may we direct your call?" into the Greeting Script field
Click on the Voice selection option "Default"

title: Required field validation: company name omitted blocks submission
description: Verifies the form prevents submission and displays an error when company name is missing.

steps.description: Type "Hello, thanks for calling. How can I help?" into the Greeting Script field
Click on the Voice selection option "Default"

title: Required field validation: voice not selected blocks submission (if voice is required)
description: Verifies the form blocks submission and shows a validation message if voice selection is required and not chosen.

steps.description: Type "Harbor ENT" into the Company Name field
Type "Thanks for calling Harbor ENT. How may we assist you today?" into the Greeting Script field

title: Already-verified number shows success message and verified status
description: Verifies that starting verification for a number already verified in Twilio shows the blue success box and a visible verified status.

steps.description: Click the "Verified Caller ID" item in the dashboard navigation
Type "+14155550100" into the phone number field
Verify text "Phone number is already verified!" is visible

title: Not-yet-verified number displays a 6-digit validation code in the blue box
description: Verifies that starting verification for an unverified number displays a visible 6-digit code in the blue code box.

steps.description: Click the "Verified Caller ID" item in the dashboard navigation
Type "+14155550101" into the phone number field
Verify element "Blue validation code box" is visible

title: Complete verification after code is shown and see verified status
description: Verifies that after a validation code is generated, the user can complete setup and see a verified status in the UI.

steps.description: Click the "Verified Caller ID" item in the dashboard navigation
Type "+14155550102" into the phone number field
Verify element "Blue validation code box" is visible

title: Remove verification and confirm status is removed
description: Verifies that a user can remove an existing verification and the UI no longer shows the number as verified.

steps.description: Click the "Verified Caller ID" item in the dashboard navigation
Click the "Confirm" button in the confirmation dialog

title: Attempt to complete setup without pre-check shows an error
description: Verifies that clicking "Verify & Complete Setup" without running the pre-check shows an error indicating verification failed or pre-check was skipped.

steps.description: Click the "Verified Caller ID" item in the dashboard navigation

title: Invalid phone number format blocks Start Verification and shows validation message
description: Verifies that entering a non-E.164 phone number prevents the verification flow and shows a visible error/validation message.

steps.description: Click the "Verified Caller ID" item in the dashboard navigation
Type "415-555-0100" into the phone number field
Verify text "invalid phone number" is visible

title: Empty phone number blocks Start Verification
description: Verifies that starting verification with an empty phone number shows a visible required-field error.

steps.description: Click the "Verified Caller ID" item in the dashboard navigation

title: Cancel removal in confirmation dialog keeps verification intact
description: Verifies that canceling the remove confirmation does not remove the verified status.

steps.description: Click the "Verified Caller ID" item in the dashboard navigation
Click the "Cancel" button in the confirmation dialog
